basics.name: Christopher Blow France
basics.label: User experience research, software development, digital product design
basics.summary: User experience research, design, and development.

work.summary: I work on technical product design for continuous integration in a MacOS/Cloud test automation platform.

work.position: User Experience Lead and Software Engineer
work.summary: I led frontend development and product design at a startup aimed at promoting electric vehicle adoption.
I led UI for a venture studio serving subject matter experts using applied machine learning in the health and energy sectors.
I designed predictive analytics solutions for healthcare.
I designed and developed a fintech platform utilized by lenders and borrowers.
I developed a data analysis tool that was used by the machine learning team for image recognition and data cleaning.
I led a team that provided design services to media and technology clients using machine translation technology.
I conducted usability studies with clients like Sony and Electronic Arts and helped build Ethino, an app for UX researchers.

education.institution: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
